[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [IOperationSettings](./rush-lib.ioperationsettings.md) &gt; [weight](./rush-lib.ioperationsettings.weight.md)

## IOperationSettings.weight property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

How many concurrency units this operation should take up during execution. The maximum concurrent units is determined by the -p flag.

**Signature:**

```typescript
weight?: number;
```
